properties.name: lang
properties.description: String. BCP 47 code. Language to be used in the datepicker for month names and weekday labels. Can be set globally with $root.locale. This property overrides global setting

properties.name: fullWidth
properties.description: Set up full width of datepicker

properties.name: isMobile
properties.description: Responsible for displaying mobile view when set as true

properties.name: secondDate
properties.description: Second date for select and creating a date range

properties.name: selectDayList
properties.description: Allowed display on desktop version of datepicker sidebar on right side with list days for select of date range

properties.name: dayListPositive
properties.description: Set positive or negative days list range depend on the value

properties.name: dateUnset
properties.description: Responsible for unset date status of datepicker

properties.name: autoInitialize
properties.description: Responsible for auto initialize value of datepicker

properties.name: alternatingDateName
properties.description: Allow handling next functionality like if we select a date and we go past - future - future or future - future or any same double combination, we only select that date

events.name: update:secondDate
events.description: Emitted for updating the secondDate props

events.name: update:dateUnset
events.description: Emitted for updating the dateUnset props

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted for updating the value props

events.name: save
events.description: Emitted by clicks by saving buttons or when days range is selecting
